name: Tom Hardy
description: Tom Hardy is a British actor known for his intense and captivating performances in various films.

name: Shah Rukh Khan
description: Shah Rukh Khan, also known as SRK, is an Indian actor known as the 'King of Bollywood' for his contributions to Indian cinema.

name: Chris Hemsworth
description: Chris Hemsworth is an Australian actor known for his portrayal of Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and his roles in various action films.

name: Denzel Washington
description: Denzel Washington is an American actor known for his powerful and versatile performances in a wide range of films.

name: Tom Hanks
description: Tom Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker known for his heartwarming performances in various acclaimed films.

name: Robert De Niro
description: Robert De Niro is an American actor, producer, and director known for his intense performances and collaborations with Martin Scorsese.

name: Al Pacino
description: Al Pacino is an American actor and filmmaker known for his intense and iconic performances. He is considered one of the greatest actors in film history.

name: Jack Nicholson
description: Jack Nicholson is an American actor and filmmaker known for his distinctive voice and memorable performances in various genres.

name: Sean Connery
description: Sean Connery was a Scottish actor known for portraying the iconic character James Bond and his memorable performances in various films.

name: Russell Crowe
description: Russell Crowe is a New Zealand actor known for his powerful and commanding presence on screen.

name: Robert Duvall
description: Robert Duvall is an American actor known for his memorable and critically acclaimed performances.

name: Anthony Hopkins
description: Anthony Hopkins is a Welsh actor known for his powerful and compelling performances in both film and stage.

name: Dustin Hoffman
description: Dustin Hoffman is an American actor known for his versatility and exceptional performances in a wide range of roles.

name: Tommy Lee Jones
description: Tommy Lee Jones is an American actor known for his powerful and stoic portrayals of various characters.

name: Leonardo DiCaprio
description: Leonardo DiCaprio is an American actor and environmental activist known for his dedication to his craft and socially conscious roles.

name: Morgan Freeman
description: Morgan Freeman is an American actor known for his powerful and authoritative presence on screen.
